name: Secret Power
shortDesc: Effect varies with terrain. (30% paralysis chance)
isFieldMove: The Pokémon can clear an entrance into a big tree, a bush or an indent in a wall in order to create a Secret Base in Generation III's Ruby, Sapphire and Emerald and Generation VI's Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire. It is taught to Pokémon using TM43 in Generations III and IV, and TM94 in Generation VI.
